items.sentence: Tom got into a fight with someone at the party last night.
Police intervened, firing tear gas to disperse the crowds.
I got to spend some time with Tom's children last weekend.
If you're going to apologize, you should do it right away.
I can't find Tom. He hasn't already gone and left, has he?
Most of my friends are single and have never been married.
Tom isn't in his apartment. Do you know where he might be?
We should try to avoid getting into a fight we those guys.
If the rest of us can survive, I'm sure that you can, too.
Tom was able to get the cash register open with a crowbar.
